summary: This mod enables crafting exuisite golden weapons and a golden chalice.
descriptionHtml:
I made this mod primaly because I was always though that you should be able to use all those surplus gold ingots and gems to make something else out them than just jewelry. So here is a mod that allows you to use gold and gems to craft weapons, armor, dishes and other stuff.

Tha armor appears under jewelry while the weapons appear under misc. The golden plates, bowls etc. appear also under misc.

Also, you can now make your own gold coins for your special treasury along with a faberge egg that stands up and is easy to place on a table etc.

This is primaly made to be a modders resource so feel free to use this mod, just remember to credit me where it's due. :P

[code][youtube]cvR6ZzR_-i4[/youtube][/code]
author: lautasantenni
